lead_paragraph: About half a million people are at risk of starving and more areas are cut off from aid, United Nations relief officials say.

headline.print_headline: Hunger Grows in Syria as U.N. Peace Talks Near
headline.main: Deprivation in Syria Deepens as U.N. Talks Loom

snippet: About half a million people are at risk of starving and more areas are cut off from aid, United Nations relief officials say.
abstract: United Nations officials say almost half million people are at risk of starvation in total of 18 besieged areas in Syria; asserts combatants have obstructed delivery of humanitarian aid delivery and limited amounts of food that have made it through will not last; announcement complicates upcoming Geneva peace talks, already beset by confusion over exactly who will participate.
